Body:
with open(os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__),
    '../resources/test_filter.pickle'), 'rb') as fi:
    st_filter = pickle.load(fi)
searcher = StarsSearcherRedis([st_filter], db_connector='OgleII', save_path
    ='/tmp/test_stars')
queries = [{'field': 'LMC_SC3', 'starid': i} for i in range(1, 10)]
searcher.queryStars(queries)
assert len(searcher.getPassedStars()) > 0
time.sleep(2)
assert len(searcher.getStatus()) >= int(len(queries) * 0.6)
